name: The Twiggles VR
description: A 3D puzzle game designed specifically for VR. Immerse yourself in the unique world of the Twiggles and enjoy hours of mind-blowing, brain-twisting, puzzle-solving fun. Get creative and design your own puzzles with the built-in VR editor and earn points for twisting the brains of your friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 150 MB available space
